DOC.brief_summary: NULL HYPOTHESIS • There difference incidence hypoglycemia among preterms receive either two hourly 10 % dextrose boluses 10 % dextrose infusion burettes 72 hour admission Special Care Unit- Mulago Hospital . ALTERNATE HYPOTHESIS • Use two hourly 10 % dextrose bolus increase incidence hypoglycemia 30 % compare 10 % dextrose infusion burette among preterms admit Special Care Unit first 72 hour admission .
DOC.brief_title: Dextrose Infusion Burettes Versus Dextrose Boluses Prevention Neonatal Hypoglycemia
DOC.criteria: SELECTION CRITERIA Inclusion criterion Preterms whose care givers/ mother give inform consent Preterms whose age < 24 hour life Preterms birth weight ≥1kg Preterms random blood sugar ≥ 2.6 mmol/l admission SCU . Exclusion Criteria Absence biological mother abandon baby Presence gross congenital abnormality . Very sick ( Apgar score ≤ 5 5 minute
